name: Super Go-Kart Racing
summary: Super Mario Kart began development as a straight-forward go-kart racing game before switching directions and adding elements from the Mushroom Kingdom. Super Go-Kart Racing aims to “recreate” what the original intention of the game was. There are no weapons, coins or jumps. It’s just no-frills racing across 20 brand-new tracks set in realistic go-kart race locations. All of the music and many of the sounds have been changed to create a different experience.
